definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: We expect yield curves to steepen significantly over the medium term.
sentences.chinese: 我們預計收益率曲線將在中期顯著變陡。

sentences.english: Juve are expected to announce Trezeguet's departure before the end of the month.
sentences.chinese: 預計在這個月底之前尤文會宣佈特雷澤蓋的離開。

sentences.english: In practice, residual values are ignored if they are not expected to be material in amount.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，如果殘值金額預計不大，通常被忽略。

sentences.english: Portman is expecting the couple's first child in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 波曼預計在2011年生下他們的第一胎。

sentences.english: The system is expected to last 10 years, and have no salvage value at the end of the period.
sentences.chinese: 該系統預計在過去10年，並沒有殘值在期限結束時。

sentences.english: The deal was agreed last year and construction is expected to begin soon.
sentences.chinese: 這項輸油管道協議去年達成，修築工程預計很快開工。

sentences.english: Spider-Man 3 is due to be released in May 2007.
sentences.chinese: “蜘蛛俠三”預計於2007年五月上市。

sentences.english: The main topic of the meeting was expected to be the political crisis in Zimbabwe.
sentences.chinese: 預計，這次首腦會議的主題是津巴布韋的政治危機。

sentences.english: The cost is estimated at more than five billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 擴建工程費用預計超過50億美元。

sentences.english: Droughts and forest fires are expected to increase due to climate change.
sentences.chinese: 由於氣候變化，預計將會出現更多的乾旱和林火。

sentences.english: We would expect carry trades with larger interest rate differentials to perform even better.
sentences.chinese: 我們預計套利交易利率差越大的表現將更好。

sentences.english: The expectation is that this move will strengthen the grass-roots AMQP standardization movement.
sentences.chinese: 預計此舉將增強AMQP標準化運動的基礎。

sentences.english: The first identity cards are expected to be issued in about 18months.
sentences.chinese: 第一張該類型身份卡預計在未來18個月內將被髮布。

sentences.english: Beijing West Station is expecting 5.6 million passengers during this Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 北京西站預計春運期間將有560萬乘客。

sentences.english: Hurricane forecasters expect this year's hurricane season to be busier than average.
sentences.chinese: 氣象預報員預計今年的颶風季會比往常更加頻繁。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
to delay/to postpone/to keep putting sth off/to procrastinate/(computing) to lag
